DOC.brief_summary: To compare Azithromycin plus Chloroquine versus Mefloquine treat uncomplicated plasmodium falciparum malaria .
DOC.brief_title: Azithromycin Plus Chloroquine Versus Mefloquine In Treatment Uncomplicated P. Falciparum Malaria .
DOC.criteria: Females males 18 year age old uncomplicated , symptomatic malaria indicate presence following : Blood smear positive Plasmodium falciparum asexual parasitemia 1000 100,000 parasite Documented fever ( 38.5 C/101.3 F rectal tympanic ; 37.5 C/99.5 F axillary 38 C/100.4 F oral ) history fever ( report subject ) within prior 24 hour . Severe complicate malaria . Pregnant breastfeed woman .
